title: W3C Technical Architecture Group-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Technical Architecture Group

items.content_html:
Go to: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@property
Notice the CSS Houdini link redirects to https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs//Web/Guide/Houdini. The double slash is the problem. The link is in the first paragraph:
items.title: [css-properties-values-api-1] Content bug: @property CSS Houdini wrong link
